content: Once you've beaten the Keeper of the Flaming Mountains and the Yin-Yang Fish, you'll be returned to The Emerald Hall.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Furnace Valley Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'The Emerald Hall' and the sub-subsection 'Missable Transformation Spell'.
The content is as follows:
Once you've beaten the Keeper of the Flaming Mountains and the Yin-Yang Fish, you'll be returned to The Emerald Hall.
